snippet.title: Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet - HD 720P - Final Trailer June 2011
snippet.description: Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet is a side-scrolling adventure that is a fusion of art, classical animation, and captivating gameplay, created by artist, Michel Gagné, and game industry veteran, Joe Olson. It is developed by Shadow Planet Productions and available on XBLA and PC. For more info, visit the official website at http://www.InsanelyTwistedShadowPlanet.com
